resources.string: I am currently speaking about Android Layouts at DroidCon in Spain. I will be tweeting links to related information during my presentation.
Read more on FrameLayout at http://bit.ly/rHpmmA
My blog article on LinearLayout is at http://bit.ly/sGLff1
For more information about RelativeLayout go to http://bit.ly/t1fRGC
Further details on TableTayout can be found at http://bit.ly/sWs136
For more GridLayout goodness see http://bit.ly/tTxMxC, http://bit.ly/uP8gGY, & http://bit.ly/tEvVIK
For more info on wrap_content & weights go to http://bit.ly/sTa2Io
The blog article is at http://bit.ly/umxkPW, and the source code is at http://bit.ly/sdIyBH
